content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-16.0, -51.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (x=-16.0, y=-51.0)
  - Fuel: 2 units of coal
  - Status: Working
  - Warnings: Output blocked by item on the ground. There is no sink entity in place to accept the output.
  - Neighbours: Stone Furnace at Position (x=-14.0, y=-49.0)
  - Drop Position: (x=-16.5, y=-52.5)
  - Resources: 40,000 units of iron ore
- Stone Furnace at Position (x=-14.0, y=-49.0)
  - Fuel: 14 units of coal
  - Status: No ingredients to smelt
  - Warnings: No ingredients to smelt
  - Furnace Result: 60 units of iron plate

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when moving entities to occupied locations
- Verify that the target location for moving an entity is unoccupied before attempting to move the entity there.

### Errors when retrieving entities from specific positions
- Confirm the presence of the entity at the specified position before attempting to retrieve it.
